Detailed Description

Decomposes a matrix into sparse and low rank terms and do math operations.

Apply M - u*v'

Function Documentation

void muv ( dcell **  xout,
const MUV_T *  A,
const dcell *  xin,
const double  alpha 
)

Apply the sparse plug low rand compuation to xin without scaling of alpha: ; U,V are low rank. 

00030                                                                             {
00031     spcellmulmat(xout, A->M, xin, alpha);
00032     dcell *tmp=NULL;
00033     dcellmm(&tmp,A->V, xin, "tn", -1.);
00034     dcellmm(xout,A->U, tmp, "nn", alpha);
00035     dcellfree(tmp);
00036     if(A->extra){
00037     (*A->exfun)(xout, A->extra, xin, alpha);
00038     }
00039 }

void muv_chol_solve ( dmat **  xout,
const MUV_T *  A,
const dmat *  xin 
)

Apply cholesky backsubstitution solve to xin to get xout.

Create xout is not exist already. The cholesky factors are prepared in setup_recon.c and stored in ((MUV_T*)A)->C 

00047                                                                  {
00048     dzero(*xout);
00049     chol_solve(xout,A->C,xin);
00050     dmat *tmp=NULL;
00051     dmm(&tmp,A->Vp,xin,"tn",-1);
00052     dmm(xout,A->Up,tmp,"nn",1);
00053     dfree(tmp);
00054 }

00057                                                                         {

void muv_chol_prep ( MUV_T *  A  ) 

Cholesky factorization on the sparse matrix and its low rank terms. 

00067                             { 
00068     if(!A->M) error("M has to be none NULL\n");
00069     info("muv_chol_prep:");
00070     dsp *muvM=spcell2sp(A->M);
00071     A->C=chol_factorize(muvM);
00072     spfree(muvM);
00073     if(A->U){
00074     dmat *U=dcell2m(A->U);
00075     A->Up=NULL;
00076     chol_solve(&(A->Up),A->C,U);
00077 
00078     dfree(U);
00079     dmat *V=dcell2m(A->V);
00080     dmat *UpV=NULL;//UpV=I-Up'*V
00081     dmm(&UpV,A->Up,V,"tn",-1);
00082     for(unsigned long ii=0; ii<UpV->ny; ii++){
00083         UpV->p[ii+ii*UpV->nx]+=1;
00084     }
00085     dinv_inplace(UpV);//Upv=(Upv)^-1
00086     dmat *VI=NULL;//VI=V*UpV
00087     dmm(&VI,V,UpV,"nn",-1);
00088     dfree(UpV);
00089     dfree(V);
00090     chol_solve(&(A->Vp),A->C,VI);
00091     dfree(VI);
00092     }
00093 }

void muv_chol_free ( MUV_T *  A  )

00097                             {
00098     if(A->C){
00099     chol_free(A->C);
00100     dfree(A->Up);
00101     dfree(A->Vp);
00102     A->C=NULL;
00103     }
00104 }

00108                        {
00109     spcellfree(A->M);
00110     dcellfree(A->U);
00111     dcellfree(A->V);

00113     free(A->extra);//a struct contains pointers.
00114     }
00115     muv_chol_free(A);
00116 }
